It really does something I've been

now, which is we initially started
using, machine learning conventions

talking about data loaders and data
sets, but Monty doesn't work on

datasets, it works in environments,
and by interacting in environments.

So we wrapped some code around that,
but still used that naming convention.

And now it's much clearer from looking
at the code, how it's supposed to…

Supposed to be, so before we had the
data loader and dataset, and now that
turned into the environment interface.

which Monty basically uses to
interface with any kind of environment.
So
yeah, thanks a lot, Anna.

For making all these changes,
